thread.title: Planned Back-Channel Talks Between U.S., North Korea Scuttled - WSJ
thread.title_full: Planned Back-Channel Talks Between U.S., North Korea Scuttled - WSJ

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: Planned Back-Channel Talks Between U.S., North Korea Scuttled - WSJ
text:
Google+ Feb. 24, 2017 9:36 p.m. ET 
SEOUL—Plans for back-channel talks in New York between North Korean and U.S. representatives were scuttled Friday after the State Department withdrew the visa approvals for Pyongyang’s top envoy on American relations, according to people familiar with the matter, ending an early attempt at rapprochement between leader Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump. 
The talks, which were scheduled to take place on March 1 and 2 at a hotel just outside the United Nations headquarters in Manhattan, where North Korea has a mission,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
